EmailTemplate.subject: Let's connect at the conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
The 13th Digital Dealer is right around the corner and VinSolutions wants to see you there! Booth #1109.
Among the booth buzz and give-aways, our top Sales and Service staff is, more importantly, available for live demonstrations, real product comparisons and personalized consultations. We understand that space may be limited between workshops and networking and so we would like to reserve an appointment for you that will allow us too maximize our time together.
Please call or email to set up a meeting customized to your specific ILM, CRM, Inventory, Market Pricing, Desking, Website, Marketing, Advertising and other needs. We are confident that www.vinsolutions.com provides the tools that will take your dealership to the next level of effeciency and profitability.
You are also invited to join Sean Stapleton as he presents "Connecting the Data Point Dots" on Tuesday, 10/23 at 2:30 pm PST: http://www.digitaldealerconference.com/speakers/#Stapleton
Dan Moore will show you how to more effectively use new Facebook features during DD Learning Labs throughout the conference: http://www.digitaldealerconference.com/learninglabs/#facebook
Stay updated through Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/VinSolutions), Twitter (http://twitter.com/vinsolutions) and the VinCommunity (http://www.VinCommunity.com). #BeOneWithVin! You won't want to miss the #VinAfterHours event featuring a concert by the Blues Brothers at BB Kings inside the Mirage on Tuesday at 7:30pm. Blue is Back!
And finally, if we do miss you now and at DD13 - give us a call and we can connect. We have some exciting announcements with VinMobile and even more industry-leading innnovations that I know you will want to see for yourself.
Sincerely, The VinSolutions Team 1-800-980-4488 sales@vinsolutions.com
